title: Did Hawaii Buy ‘Death Pods’ After Legalizing Physician-Assisted Death?
subtitle: In 2019, Hawaii became the seventh U.S. state to legalize physician-assisted death for some terminally ill patients.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: Following the Jan. 1, 2019, legalization of physician-assisted death in Hawaii, state leaders bought 30 “passing assistance pods."
